function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived advantage of greater security leading to increased housing prices","Impact":"Rising housing prices and potential unaffordability for certain communities","Mitigation":"Implementation of affordable housing policies and regulations","Technologies":"Real estate management systems for price monitoring and regulation","People":"Residents, particularly those in non-gated communities","Owner":"Government, real estate regulators"},{"Description":"Lack of direct medical evidence to conclude the effectiveness of gated communities in reducing COVID-19 risk","Impact":"Uncertain public health strategies and reliance on unverified assumptions","Mitigation":"Conducting extensive research and clinical studies on gated communities and COVID-19 spread","Technologies":"Health data analytics for epidemiological studies","People":"Public health officials, researchers, community residents","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Shift in housing preferences influenced by the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Changing demand for housing types and infrastructure, potential imbalance in housing supply","Mitigation":"Adapting urban planning and infrastructure development based on evolving housing preferences","Technologies":"Urban planning software for demographic analysis","People":"Real estate developers, urban planners, potential homeowners","Owner":"Local government, city planning authorities"}]}
